overview: Mom and dad are sitting up in bed, watching TV, when Paula enters the room in her robe. She is holding a suspicious glass of water, which she hands to mom. When mom notices her, she tells her how adorable she looks and beckons her over to join them. Later, Paula stares down at her unconscious mother before dad breaks the silence. "Took long enough tonight." he says standing up and starting to remove his pajamas. "Are you wearing what I bought you?" Paula stands up too... almost to disrobe. "Wait." he orders. "I wantto save up for that. First, I think I want to fuck your face in that cute little robe for a minute. My sweet baby girl." Also. two delinquent teen girls (Aubrey Sinclair & Jill Kassidy) are corrupted by voyeuristic grandparents.
title: The Family Tradition
